StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.Description: Displays the device version. This tag will also highlight if the firmware is a beta or custom design.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceProductIDBuild
StringReg.ToolTip: Device Product ID and Build Number
StringReg.Description: Provides the hardware Product ID and software Build Number

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.Description: Displays the deviceâ€™s factory set serial number.

StringReg.Name: TimingVersion
StringReg.Description: Timing Version loaded by File UPPG Pattern

Integer.Name: deviceMacAddress
Integer.Description: Displays the unique MAC (Media Access Control) address of the Device.

Enumeration.Name: deviceAcquisitionType
Enumeration.Description: Displays the Device Acquisition Type of the product.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The device gets its data directly from a sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: The device gets its data directly from a sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GigEVision
EnumEntry.Description: GigE Vision

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.Description: Feature to store a user-programmable identifier of up to 15 characters. The default factory setting is the detector serial number.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefaultSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specify the detector configuration set to load and make active on detector power-up or reset
Enumeration.Description: Specify the detector configuration set to load and make active on detector power-up or reset. The detector configuration sets are stored in detector non volatile memory.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: This option select the Factory Setting values as the Power-up Configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: User defined Configuration saved in the UserSet 1
EnumEntry.Description: Select the user defined configuration UserSet 1 as the Power-up Configuration.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: User defined Configuration saved in the UserSet 2
EnumEntry.Description: Select the user defined configuration UserSet 2 as the Power-up Configuration.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the detector configuration set to load feature settings from or save current feature settings to. The Factory set contains default detector feature settings. User detector configuration sets contain feature settings previously saved by the user.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.Description: Select the default detector feature settings saved by the Factory.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet1
EnumEntry.Description: Select the User defined Configuration space UserSet1 to save to or load from features settings previously saved by the user.

EnumEntry.Name: UserSet2
EnumEntry.Description: Select the User defined Configuration space UserSet2 to save to or load from features settings previously saved by the user.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Load the currently selected user detector configuration set
Command.Description: Loads the detector configuration set, specified by the User Set Selector feature, to the detector and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.Description: Saves the current detector configuration to the user set specified by the User Set Selector feature. The user sets are located on the detector in non volatile memory.

EnumEntry.Name: LoadBusyError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The detector is busy and cannot perform the action

EnumEntry.Name: LoadMemoryError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Not enough memory to load set

EnumEntry.Name: LoadInvalidSetError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: At least one register could not be restored properly

EnumEntry.Name: LoadResourceManagerError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An internal error happenned related to the resource manager.

EnumEntry.Name: SaveBusyError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The detector is busy and cannot perform the action

EnumEntry.Name: SaveMemoryError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: detector ran out of memory while saving set

EnumEntry.Name: SaveInvalidSetError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An invalid user set was requested

EnumEntry.Name: SaveResourceManagerError
EnumEntry.ToolTip: An internal error happenned related to the resource manager.

Integer.Description: Major revision of Dalsa Feature Naming Convention which was used to create the device's XML.

Integer.Name: deviceDFNCVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor revision of Dalsa Feature Naming Convention which was used to create the device's XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.Description: SubMinor Version of the Genicam Standard Features Naming Convention which was used to create the device's XML.

Integer.ToolTip: Date when the detector was calibrated

Integer.Description: Revision of settings programmed into detector like voltages

Enumeration.Description: In Standby the power supply to the sensor is off

EnumEntry.Description: Off

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.Description: On

Float.ToolTip: Frame Rate(frames per second), only works with Full resolution and binning 2x2 mode

Integer.Description: Length of frame blanking interval in line periods;see Shad-o-Box HS Command Reference;use as alternative to Frame Interval

EnumEntry.Name: ONEX

EnumEntry.Name: TWOX
EnumEntry.Description: 2xGain

Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel provided by the device. Contains all information as provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter, combined in one single value.

EnumEntry.Name: MonoSigned
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel is monochrome and signed

EnumEntry.Name: MonoPacked
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel is monochrome and packed

EnumEntry.Name: Raw
EnumEntry.Description: Pixel is raw Bayer

Enumeration.Name: Mono12PackedBitSelection
Enumeration.Description: Selects the upper or lower 12 bit of the 14 bit pixeldata

EnumEntry.Name: Upper12Bit
EnumEntry.Description: Upper 12 bit

EnumEntry.Name: Lower12bitClamping
EnumEntry.Description: Lower 12 bit and clamping

Category.Name: acquisitionTransferControl
Category.ToolTip: Category of features related to actual image acquisition and transfer.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.Description: Set the acquisition mode of the device. It defines the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured for each AcquisitionStart Command. An AcquisitionStop occurs at the end of the Active Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.Description: A sequence of frames is captured for each AcquisitionStart Command. The number of frames is specified by AcquisitionFrameCount feature. An AcquisitionStop occurs at the end of the Active Frame(s).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously with AcquisitionStart until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Start image capture using currently selected acquistion mode
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode feature.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current frame unless the triggerFrameCount feature is greater then 1.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.Description: Aborts the acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current frame or aborts waiting on a trigger. If no acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored.

Command.Name: AcquisitionArm
Command.Description: Arms the device before an AcquisitionStart command. This optional command validates all the current features for consistency and prepares the device for a fast start of the acquisition. If not used explicitly, this command is automatically executed at the first AcquisitionStart but will not be repeated for subsequent ones unless a data transfer related feature is changed in the device.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.Description: Number of frames to be acquired in MultiFrame acquisition mode.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingStart
Command.Description: Announces the start of registers streaming without immediate checking for consistency.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersStreamingEnd
Command.Description: Announces end of registers streaming and performs validation for registers consistency before activating them.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceStart
Command.Description: Announces the start of feature streaming without immediate checking for consistency.

Command.Name: DeviceFeaturePersistenceEnd
Command.Description: Announces end of feature streaming and performs validation for feature consistency before activating them.

Command.Name: DeviceRegistersCheck
Command.Description: Performs an explicit register set validation for consistency.

Boolean.Name: DeviceRegistersValid
Boolean.Description: States if the current register set is valid and consistent.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Features related to GigE Vision specification and Ethernet Connection

Enumeration.Name: deviceUPnPDiscoveryMode
Enumeration.Description: Controls the operation mode for the UPnP Discovery function..

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.Description: UPNP Device will not broadcast its existence on the network and is not visible in the Windows network neighborhood.

EnumEntry.Name: Active
EnumEntry.Description: UPNP Device will broadcast its existence on the network and is visible in the Windows network neighborhood.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PayloadSize
IntSwissKnife.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.Description: Major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.Description: Minor version of the specification.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestEntrySelector
Integer.Description: Selects the manifest entry to reference.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMajorVersion
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the XML file of the selected manifest entry.

MaskedIntReg.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMajorVersion_Reg
MaskedIntReg.Description: Indicates the major version number of the XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMinorVersion
Integer.Description: Indicates the Minor version number of the XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLSubMinorVersion
Integer.Description: Indicates the SubMinor version number of the XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMajorVersion
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the Schema file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMinorVersion
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the Schema file of the selected manifest entry.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManifestPrimaryURL
StringReg.ToolTip: First URL to the XML Device Description File
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManifestSecondaryURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Secondary URL to the XML Device Description File
StringReg.Description: Indicates the secondary URL to the XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.

Float.Name: devicePacketResendBufferSize
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the amount of memory to reserve in MBytes for the packet resend buffer.
Float.Description: Indicates the amount of memory to reserve in MBytes for the packet resend buffer.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of the device registers.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.Description: Reports the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.Description: Reports the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPHeartbeatDisable
Boolean.ToolTip: GVCP command execution time before PENDING_ACK
Boolean.Description: Disables the GVCP (GigE Vision Control Protocol) heartbeat monitor. This allows control switchover to an application on another device.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Select the stream channel to control
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.Description: Index of network interface.

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send the data stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.Description: This feature state is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSBigEndianSupported
Integer.Description: SCPSBigEndian is not supported yet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in microseconds) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevGVSPExtendedIDMode
Boolean.Description: Enables the extended IDs mode. -SS

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.Description: Indicates the transmission speed negotiated by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if LLA mode is supported
Boolean.Description: Indicates if LLA (Auto-IP) is supported by the selected interface. The LLA method automatically assigns the detector with a randomly chosen address on the 169.254.xxx.xxx subnet. After an address is chosen, the link-local process sends an ARP query with that IP onto the network to see if it is already in use. If there is no response, the IP is assigned to the device, otherwise another IP is selected, and the ARP is repeated. Note that LLA is unable to forward packets across routers. LLA is the recommended scheme when only one NIC is connected to GigE detectors; ensure only one NIC is using LLA on your PC, otherwise IP conflicts will result.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.Description: Indicates if DHCP is supported by the selected interface. This IP configuration mode requires a DHCP server to allocate an IP address dynamically over the range of some defined subnet. The detector must be configured to have DHCP enabled. This is the factory default settings. The DHCP server is part of a managed network. Windows itself does not provide a DHCP server function therefore a dedicated DHCP server is required. The DALSA Network Configuration Tool can be configured as a DHCP server on the NIC used for the GigE Vision network.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if Persistent IP is supported
Boolean.Description: Indicates if Persistent IP is supported by the selected interface. This protocol is only suggested if the user fully controls the assignment of IP addresses on the network and a GigE Vision detector is connected beyond routers. The GigE Vision detector is forced a static IP address. The NIC IP address must use the same subnet otherwise the detector is not accessible. If the detector is connected to a network with a different subnet, it cannot be accessed.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.Description: Returns TRUE if the selected GEV option is supported.

Enumeration.Name: GevIPConfigurationStatus
Enumeration.Description: Reports the current IP configuration status.

EnumEntry.Name: None
EnumEntry.Description: Device IP Configuration is not defined.

EnumEntry.Name: PersistentIP
EnumEntry.Description: Device IP Address Configuration is set to Persistent IP (static).

EnumEntry.Name: DHCP
EnumEntry.Description: Device IP Address Configuration is set to DHCP (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol). Network requires a DHCP server.

EnumEntry.Name: LLA
EnumEntry.Description: Device IP Address Configuration is set to LLA (Link-Local Address). Also known as Auto-IP. Used for unmanaged networks including direct connections from a device to a dedicated NIC.

EnumEntry.Name: ForceIP
EnumEntry.Description: Device IP Address Configuration is set to ForceIP. Used to force an IP address change.

Enumeration.Name: GevCurrentIPConfiguration
Enumeration.Description: Current detector IP configuration of the selected interface.

EnumEntry.Name: LLA
EnumEntry.Description: Link-Local Address Mode

EnumEntry.Name: DHCP
EnumEntry.Description: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol Mode. Network requires a DHCP server.

EnumEntry.Name: PersistentIP
EnumEntry.Description: Persistent IP Mode (static)

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent IP address for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent IP address for the selected interface. This is the IP address the detector uses when booting in Persistent IP mode.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent subnet mask for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent subnet mask for the selected interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Persistent default gateway for the selected interface
Integer.Description: Persistent default gateway for the selected interface.

Integer.Name: GevDiscoveryAckDelay
Integer.Description: Indicates the maximum randomized delay the device will wait to acknowledge a discovery command.

Boolean.Name: GevGVCPExtendedStatusCodes
Boolean.Description: Enables generation of extended status codes.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationSocket
Integer.Description: Returns the UDP (User Datagram Protocol) source port of the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevPrimaryApplicationIPAddress
Integer.Description: Returns the IP address of the device hosting the primary application.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

EnumEntry.Name: OpenAccess
EnumEntry.Description: OpenAccess

EnumEntry.Name: ExclusiveAccess
EnumEntry.Description: Grants exclusive access to the device to an application. No other application can control or monitor the device.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlAccess
EnumEntry.Description: Grants control access to the device to an application. No other application can control the device.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlAccessSwitchoverActive
EnumEntry.Description: Enables another application to request control access to the device.

Enumeration.Name: deviceCCP
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

EnumEntry.Name: ExclusiveAccess
EnumEntry.Description: Grants exclusive access to the device to an application. No other application can control or monitor the device.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlAccess
EnumEntry.Description: Grants control access to the device to an application. No other application can control the device.

EnumEntry.Name: ControlAccessSwitchoverActive
EnumEntry.Description: Enables another application to request control access to the device.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device (0 to 512).

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the LLA (Link Local Address) IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the DHCP IP configuration scheme (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol) is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.Description: Controls whether the PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.Description: When this feature is set to True, the device will fire one test packet.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Flag to indicate if features are locked during acquisition.
Integer.Description: Flag to indicate if features are locked during acquisition.

Category.Name: FileAccessControl
Category.ToolTip: Category of features related to File access Control for the device

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the file to access. The file types which are accessible are device-dependent.

EnumEntry.Name: Firmware1
EnumEntry.Description: Upload new firmware to the detector which will execute on the next detector reboot cycle. Select the DeviceReset feature after the upload completes.

EnumEntry.Name: UPPGPattern
EnumEntry.Description: Upload new UPPG Pattern file to detector

EnumEntry.Name: DefectMapFullResHFW
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Defectmap Full Resolution High Full Well
EnumEntry.Description: Defectmap Full Resolution High Full Well
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Defectmap Full Resolution High Full Well

EnumEntry.Name: DefectMapFullResLFW
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Defectmap Full Resolution Low Full Well
EnumEntry.Description: Defectmap Full Resolution Low Full Well
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Defectmap Full Resolution Low Full Well

EnumEntry.Name: DefectMapBin2HFW
EnumEntry.Description: Defectmap Binning2 High Full Well

EnumEntry.Name: DefectMapBin2LFW
EnumEntry.Description: Defectmap Binning2 Low Full Well

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device. This operation is executed when the File Operation Execute feature is called.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.Description: Select the Open operation - executed by FileOperationExecute.

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.Description: Select the Close operation - executed by FileOperationExecute.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.Description: Select the Read operation - executed by FileOperationExecute

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.Description: Select the Write operation - executed by FileOperationExecute

EnumEntry.Name: Delete
EnumEntry.Description: Select the Delete operation - executed by FileOperationExecute

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by File Operation Selector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode used to open a file on the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.Description: Select read-only open mode

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.Description: Select write-only open mode

Integer.Name: FileAccessOffset
Integer.Description: Controls the mapping offset between the device file storage and the file access buffer.

Integer.Name: FileAccessLength
Integer.Description: Controls the mapping length between the device file storage and the file access buffer.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.Description: Displays the file operation execution status.

EnumEntry.Name: Success
EnumEntry.Description: The last file operation has completed successfully.

EnumEntry.Name: Failure
EnumEntry.Description: The last file operation has completed unsuccessfully for an unknown reason.

EnumEntry.Name: FileUnavailable
EnumEntry.Description: The last file operation has completed unsuccessfully because the file is currently unavailable.

EnumEntry.Name: FileInvalid
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected file in not present in this detector model
EnumEntry.Description: The last file operation has completed unsuccessfully because the selected file in not present in this detector model.

IntSwissKnife.Name: FileOperationResult
IntSwissKnife.Description: Displays the file operation result. For Read or Write operations, the number of successfully read/written bytes is returned.

Register.Name: FileAccessBuffer
Register.Description: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.

IntReg.Name: FileSize
IntReg.Description: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.

Register.Name: deviceUserBuffer
Register.ToolTip: Unallocated memory available to the user for data storage.
Register.Description: Unallocated memory available to the user for data storage.

Boolean.Name: ftpFileAccessSupported
Boolean.Description: Shows whether File Access is supported over FTP.
